alert.note: Alert for Bent (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 3:13PM MDT until June 23 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM MDT FOR EAST CENTRAL BENT COUNTY... At 313 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of John Martin Reservoir, or 23 miles east of North La Junta, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Bent County. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
